Title: Client for Statistics Canada's Open Economic Data
Authors@R:
c(
person("Thierry", "Warin", email = "thierry.warin@hec.ca", role =c("aut", "cre"), comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-5921-3428") ),
person("Romain", "Le Duc", role = "aut"))
Description:
An easy connection with R to Statistics Canada's Web Data Service. Open economic data (formerly known as CANSIM tables, now identified by Product IDs (PID)) are accessible as a data frame, directly in the user's R environment.
Warin, Le Duc (2019) <doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.10544735>.
Author:
Thierry Warin [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0002-5921-3428>),
Romain Le Duc [aut]
